title: Turkish for Beginners
headline: This free online course covers the basic principles of Turkish grammar and pronunciation and provides vocabulary.
description: This free online course will teach you the basics of the Turkish language. You will learn the Turkish alphabet and how to pronounce letters. We will describe everyday greetings, formal introductions and essential vocabulary. We will also cover basic grammar and terminology related to colours, numbers, animals, dates and times. You will learn to converse in simple sentences and understand simple grammar rules in Turkish. Enrol today.
courseDescription:
Are you a fan of the Turkish language and want to communicate like a native? If so, you've come to the right place. This free online course will assist you in understanding and learning the fundamentals of Turkish. First, we will introduce you to the Turkish alphabet and how to pronounce each letter. We will use several examples to practise the various sounds and pronunciations and then teach you how to greet someone and make a formal introduction. We will also explain multiple greeting phrases used at different times of the day. Following that, you will learn how to describe numbers from one to ten and how to structure numbers with tenths, hundreds and thousands.

The course will also explore the vocabulary used in Turkish to represent various colours. We will provide several examples to practise their names. The course's most exciting section will be about Turkish cuisine. We will research the vocabulary related to essential food items and how you can use this in sentence structures. We will then study the names of various animals. Throughout the course, we demonstrate using varied practice exercises to help you focus on sentence structure pronunciations and grammatical rules. We will also provide exercise and fitness vocabulary. We will highlight several important verbs used in everyday life and their formations in the present tense. 

This course will also teach you how to conjugate verbs. Specific rules regarding vowel harmony and verb formations in Turkish will help you converse like a pro. We will use several examples to demonstrate these grammatical rules and formations. Date and time expression is an integral part of any language. Study the months of a year, days of the week and how to tell the time in Turkish. Numerous key phrases used in everyday conversations, such as ordering a meal or complimenting someone, will be taught. This course is appropriate for anyone who wants to build a strong foundation in Turkish and is ideal if you are a professional linguist or someone who enjoys learning languages. Sign up today!
